name: Easy Membership and Magazine
author: EMM Project

sections.description:
Best Easy Membership and Magazine for WordPress

Easy Membership and Magazine (EMM) is the world’s easiest plugin for creating membership sites in WordPress.

You can send email newsletters to members as well as free member sites.

Easy Membership and Magazine (EMM) is very easy to use.

Simply insert a shortcode in the middle of a post or fixed page on your WordPress site where you want to make it available only to members.
Of course, you don’t need to remember the shortcode, and a menu for inserting the shortcode, “Start Membership Post” and “End Membership Post” will be added to the block editor. ClassicEditor is also supported.

Features of the plugin include

  • Display style settings such as buttons and borders
  • Members-only login page slug settings
  • SMTP email settings
  • Mail magazine sending functionality
  • Auto-send email settings
  • Free membership registration
  • User-specific login page
  • User-specific My Page

Read about all of the plugin’s features at Easy Membership and Magazine

Other links

  • Control Emmproject – Store connection to stripe webhook. (Terms of service – Privacy Policy).
sections.installation:
1. From the WP admin panel, click “Plugins” -> “Add new”.
  2. In the browser input box, type “Easy Membership and Magazine”.
  3. Select the “Easy Membership and Magazine” plugin and click “Install”.
  4. Activate the plugin.

OR…

  1. Download the plugin from this page.
  2. Save the .zip file to a location on your computer.
  3. Open the WP admin panel, and click “Plugins” -> “Add new”.
  4. Click “upload”.. then browse to the .zip file downloaded from this page.
  5. Click “Install”.. and then “Activate plugin”.

** For more details, please visit the official website. **
sections.faq:
Do I need to know any coding to use this plugin?

No, we have built Easy Membership and Magazine (EMM) to be extremely easy to use and does not require you to manually build shortcodes or have any coding knowledge.

Is Easy Membership and Magazine (EMM) mobile responsive?

Yes. Easy Membership and Magazine (EMM) is designed to adapt nicely to any screen resolution. It includes specific designs for phones, tablets and desktops.

Does the plugin work with any WordPress theme?

Yes. Easy Membership and Magazine (EMM) will work with any properly coded theme. However, some themes may cause conflicts with the plugin. If you find a styling issue with your theme please create a post in the community forum or please contact us from the official website.
